name: Mario Maker
description:
Mario Maker

Design your own platformer levels based off of the classic Super Mario 3 game for the original Nintendo Entertainment System.


All characters and components in this file were recreated as pixel-perfect SVGs which are losslessly scalable. Many components also have additional features built-in such as constraints, multi-axis resizing, and repeating background patterns that allow elements to become as long or tall as you need.


How to use

You can browse the different pages directly on this page using the dropdown menu in the top left corner.

  1. Duplicate the file
  2. From the Level Builder page, open the Assets Tab
  3. Pull in environment, platforms, and characters to build out your level
  4. Share your remix to the community!


Copyright notice

All rights to characters, likeness, and objects depicted in this file belong to Nintendo.
